947cf602-8b4e-4b2b-bb2c-17b53acfc409.name: 健康
947cf602-8b4e-4b2b-bb2c-17b53acfc409.notes: +1 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate (but not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

8f524f81-e48f-47ab-b264-2cc350e36c52.name: Fit, Very
8f524f81-e48f-47ab-b264-2cc350e36c52.notes: +2 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate; lose FP at half the normal rate (in both cases, not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

bef78521-f534-44fa-bdf1-60cdc099568c.name: 高痛阈
bef78521-f534-44fa-bdf1-60cdc099568c.notes: Never suffer shock penalties when injured; +3 on all HT rolls to avoid knockdown and stunning; +3 to resist torture

debf66aa-3f86-4dea-a339-eac66e4d4860.name: Reaction Bonus
debf66aa-3f86-4dea-a339-eac66e4d4860.notes: Con artists, politicians, salesmen, etc. – but only if you aren’t trying to manipulate them.

bad9f8f4-6014-486b-bf8f-0e6cd95ea72f.name: 可选增益
bad9f8f4-6014-486b-bf8f-0e6cd95ea72f.notes: 在抵抗天赋对应的技能上获得加值

eb1f32e2-5858-4ce1-98b5-498507eeeeb1.name: 期待陪伴
eb1f32e2-5858-4ce1-98b5-498507eeeeb1.notes: React to others at +2; -1 to IQ-based skills when alone

ad75ab15-23b8-44f8-9b62-c4476c553351.name: 邪恶双生子
ad75ab15-23b8-44f8-9b62-c4476c553351.notes: 在你拥有的能力上更加强大或拥有你没有的能力

3894b700-6c86-4d12-8a27-4a6fd44d850d.name: 邪恶双生子
3894b700-6c86-4d12-8a27-4a6fd44d850d.notes: 在你拥有的能力上更加强大且拥有你没有的能力

4a12fa75-6d25-46f0-9fc5-3f03c3834cd0.name: 地域知识
4a12fa75-6d25-46f0-9fc5-3f03c3834cd0.notes: 几百亩之内的居民、痕迹、溪流、隐蔽地点、埋伏处、植物群和动物群
